title: Marathons ranked by number of finishers worldwide 2016
summary: The Marathons ranked Cities in the number finishers was Cities Chicago_U.S. , who made 51388 finishers .
The most ranked Cities was Tokyo_JPN , with just 20617 finishers .

In second place was Cities Paris_FRA with 41708 finishers ; third place went to Cities New_York_City_U.S. with 51388 finishers ; fourth place went to Cities Los_Angeles_U.S. with 20617 finishers and fifth place went to Cities London_GBR , who was 39072 finishers .
gold: The statistic shows a ranking of marathons worldwide by the total number of finishers in 2016 . In 2016 , the New York Marathon had a total of 51,388 finishers .
